humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, 'Number of lymph nodes with macrometastases (>0.2 cm): 0' and 'Number of lymph nodes with micrometastases (>0.2 mm to 0.2 cm and/or >200 cells): 0'. This indicates that there are no positive lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage is N0, as per Rules 2, 8, 10, and 11.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that four lymph nodes were examined and none of them had metastases (macro or micro). Therefore, the pathologic N stage is N0.
